meanings.definition: A rock composed of angular fragments in a matrix of finer material.
meanings.sent1: The breccias found in the quarry were made up of various broken pieces.
meanings.sent2: Geologists study breccias to understand how rocks can form from different fragments.
meanings.sent3: The breccias in the garden wall looked like a puzzle put together by nature.
meanings.sent4: The breccias in the canyon walls resembled a mosaic of earthy tones.
meanings.sent5: As I held the breccias in my hand, I could feel the rough edges of the embedded fragments.
